properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Under His wings Under His wings Who from His love can sever Under His wings My soul shall abide Safely abide forever{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Under His wings I am safely abiding Tho the night deepens And tempest are wild Still I can trust Him I know He will keep me He has redeemed me And I am His child{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Under His wings What a refuge in sorrow How the heart yearningly Turns to His rest Often when earth Has no balm for my healing There I find comfort And there I am blest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Under His wings O what precious enjoyment There will I hide 'Til life's trials are o'er Sheltered protected No evil can harm me Resting in Jesus I'm safe evermore{/lang-eng}
